input.sentences: i got all of my friends together last weekend .
i made a ton of sweets for them .
i had two batches of cupcakes .
and i also made a large cake for everyone .
i also threw together some snacks as well .
output.sentences: During the weekend, my friends and I got together to celebrate our graduation.
There were a ton of delicious looking sweets!
Someone made 5 batches of chocolate cupcakes with green frosting.
There was even a matching cake!
After the party, we threw away the leftover snacks.
